summary: A fix for the clipping on the Ragged Cap
descriptionHtml:
This is just a small tweak to the \"Ragged Cap\" mesh that gets rid of the clipping.

Just drop the \"Data\" file into your \"Skyrim\" directory, and let it over-write the Vanilla mesh.

I should explain...I was thinking of using this cap as a base for a WWI pilot inspired \"Skull-Cap\" in a clothing mod, and just HAD to fix the clipping issue before I could go on ;-)
author: ReflexShooter

files.name: Fix for Clipping on Ragged Cap - v1
files.fileName: Fix for Clipping on Ragged Cap - v1-35113-v1.zip
